Key Activities for this stage

  • Salesforce presents Caelius to the client.
  • (Budget) Discuss investment / budget.
  • (Authority) Identify decision making process and decision makers.
  • (Need) Identify specific business goals and challenges.
  • (Timing) Identify timeline & compelling use case or event.
  • Identify if Competitors are involved.
  • Confirm if NDA is needed (secure if so)


In order to exit this stage, you should have.

  • B-A-N-T identified.
  • Partner Portal: Confirm Caelius credited with ACV (and level of influence)
  • Signed NDA (if required)

Key Activities for this stage

  • Win Wire Quote requested (from Salesforce/MuleSoft AEs)
  • Salesforce Order Forms from AEs
  • ACV credited Confirmed.
  • Project intake and acceptance from Delivery leadership

Key Activities for this stage

  • Answer any final questions from decision maker.
  • Receive approval on final proposal.
  • Secure MSA
  • Secure SOW
  • Win story created.
  • Complete delivery team handoff package
  • Schedule internal project kick off meeting.
  • Ask client for referrals within network.


In order to exit this stage, you should have.

  • MSA Signed
  • SOW Signed
  • Project kick off date.
  • Project Win story

  • Pricing: High Level Resource Plan to back proposal (LINK)
